overview: See what boys do at their working places.  Work is hard but it has its rewards as these 11 young men learn to use their tools.  The movie shows eleven super hot models at their working places - in a garage, a warehouse and a car wash. In their breaks and after work their sweaty hot bodies get in touch quickly with their working buddies. In seven juicy scenes you can wath there young and hung twinks in absolutely hard action.
title: boys@work
